metadata.synopsis: A goblin who still follows the old goblin god, Maglubiyet, while the rest of his tribe have started to follow a new god, the Absolute. He sees them as heretics - they think the same of him, and have locked him in a cage. He thanks players after they save him.

0.speaker: Brakkal
0.text: Ha! Look at where the Absolute's love got 'em. Dead!
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Goblin was saved from the cage and his attackers are dealt with.NodeContext: happy to see lots of dead heretics

1.speaker: Brakkal
1.text: Thanks for breakin' me out. Gonna find me a new tribe. One that appreciates the old ways.
